segments.advisor_message: Alright, so umm, I just wanna confirm your, um, details before we wrap up. What's your first name and last name again?
segments.client_message: Yeah, it's, um, John, John Doe. But, like, my friends call me Johnny, so, y'know, that works too.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, Johnny. And when’s your, um, date of birth? Th-that'll help me a lot.
segments.client_message: Uh, it’s, um, 15th of March, in, uh, nineteen eighty-five. So, you know, I guess I'm a Pisces?

segments.advisor_message: Pisces, great! So, uh, anything else you'd like to add, maybe your email or something?
segments.client_message: Oh, right! I should've said, my email's johndoe at email dot com, but, uh, there’s also my cell... wait, um, what was I saying? Oh, yeah!
